timeline.bodyText:
The meaning of SessionProtocol.NONE and usage are different.
SessionProtocol.NONE does not represent a session protocol, is only used to get any local port using Server.activeLocalPort().
What happen when a server is built with SessionProtocol.NONE?
Server.builder()
      .port(8080, SessionProtocol.NONE)
      ...
I think this is useful for building test cases. If then, how about making SessionProtocol.HTTP default?
